nodes.text: Mogg was a male Zabrak serving the Galactic Republic who lived during the Cold War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. He sold equipment using planetary commendations as a currency at the Olaris Spaceport, in the bombed city world, on Taris.

Mogg appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Equipment Commendations Vendor for Republic players on Taris. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Mogg was removed from the game along with the rest of the Equipment Commendations Vendors.
